title: 镁凯利克纯油性金属加工油
data: 低/中碳钢,铸铁,铝,有色金属low/mediumCarbon steel,cast iron,aluminum andNon-ferrous metals.
多用途切削油,具有卓越的防腐蚀性能,不含氯、锌。Mu|ti- purpose neat cutting oil, with excellent Corrosion protectionperformance, free of chlorine And zinc适合切削、磨削及珩磨。 Mainly for cutting, grinding and honing
低/中碳/合金钢,铸铁,铝,有色金属Low/medium carbon/alloy steel,cast iron,aluminum and non-ferrousMetals.
良好的润滑性能,不含氯。 Good lubricity performance, free of chlorine.主要用于锯、车削、铣削、钻孔、齿轮加工、磨削。 Mainly for sawing turning, milling, drilling, gear cutting and grinding
低/中碳/合金钢/铸铁,铝low/mediur carbon/alloy steel,cast iron and aluminum。
优良抗磨及极压性能,不含氯。 Excellent anti-wear and EP performance, free of chlorine.可用于枪钻、深钻、攻丝、镗孔以及齿轮加工等重负荷操作 Mainly for gun-drilling, deep-hole drilling, tapping,boring and gear cutting
低/中碳/高合金/不锈钢,铸铁stainless steel and cast iron.low/medium carbon/high alloy/

优良抗磨及极压性能(优于3000系列),不含氯。Excellent anti-wear and EPperformance(better than300 series), free of chlorine可用于拉削、枪钻、深钻孔、攻丝等超负荷操作。 Mainlyfor some heavy operations like broaching, gun-drilling deep-hole drilling and tapping
低/中碳/合金/不锈钢,铸铁,铝,有色金属low/medium carbon/alloy/stainless steel,cast iron aluminumand non-ferrouis metale
良好的润滑、极佳的冲刷冷却性能。高纯度、不含芳香烃。 Good lubricity, excellentflashing and cooling pertormance. high purification, free of aromatics Mainly for rubbing and honing it is a typical EDMoil too.
